verses.verse: Now these <S%H428><s%> are [the territories] which <S%H834><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> inherited <S%H5157><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> and the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the households of the tribes <S%H1><s%> of the sons <S%H4294><s%> of Israel <S%H1121><s%> apportioned <S%H3478><s%> to them for an inheritance, <S%H5157><s%>

by the lot <S%H1486><s%> of their inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> through <S%H3027><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> for the nine <S%H8672><s%> tribes <S%H4294><s%> and the half-tribe.

For Moses <S%H4872><s%> had given <S%H5414><s%> the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the two <S%H8147><s%> tribes <S%H4294><s%> and the half-tribe beyond <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan; <S%H3383><s%> but he did not give <S%H5414><s%> an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to the Levites <S%H3881><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them.

For the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> were two <S%H8147><s%> tribes, <S%H4294><s%> Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> and Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> and they did not give <S%H5414><s%> a portion <S%H2506><s%> to the Levites <S%H3881><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> except <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> to live <S%H3427><s%> in, with their pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands <S%H4054><s%> for their livestock <S%H4735><s%> and for their property. <S%H7075><s%>

Thus <S%H3651><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and they divided <S%H2505><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>

Then the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> drew <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> in Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> and Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> the Kenizzite <S%H7074><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "You know <S%H3045><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> <S%H182><s%> you and me in Kadesh-barnea.

"I was forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> me from Kadesh-barnea to spy <S%H7270><s%> out the land, <S%H776><s%> and I brought <S%H7725><s%> word <S%H1697><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> to him as [it was] in my heart. <S%H3824><s%>

"Nevertheless my brethren <S%H251><s%> who <S%H834><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up with me made the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> melt <S%H4529><s%> with fear; <S%H4529><s%> but I followed <S%H310><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%> fully. <S%H4390><s%>

"So Moses <S%H4872><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> on that day, <S%H3117><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> on which <S%H834><s%> your foot <S%H7272><s%> has trodden <S%H1869><s%> shall be an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to you and to your children <S%H1121><s%> forever, <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> you have followed <S%H310><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%> fully. <S%H4390><s%>'

"And now <S%H6258><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has let me live, <S%H2421><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as He spoke, <S%H1696><s%> these <S%H2088><s%> forty-five years, <S%H8141><s%> from the time <S%H227><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> word <S%H1697><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> when <S%H834><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%> in the wilderness; <S%H4057><s%> and now <S%H6258><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am eighty-five years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> today. <S%H3117><s%>

"I am still <S%H5750><s%> as strong <S%H2389><s%> today <S%H3117><s%> as I was in the day <S%H3117><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> me; as my strength <S%H3581><s%> was then, <S%H227><s%> so my strength <S%H3581><s%> is now, <S%H6258><s%> for war <S%H4421><s%> and for going <S%H3318><s%> out and coming <S%H935><s%> in.

"Now <S%H6258><s%> then, give <S%H5414><s%> me this <S%H2088><s%> hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> about which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> on that day, <S%H3117><s%> for you heard <S%H8085><s%> on that day <S%H3117><s%> that Anakim <S%H6062><s%> [were] there, <S%H8033><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> fortified <S%H1219><s%> cities; <S%H5892><s%> perhaps <S%H194><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will be with me, and I shall drive <S%H3423><s%> them out as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has spoken. <S%H1696><s%>"

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> him, and gave <S%H5414><s%> Hebron <S%H2275><s%> to Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> for an inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

Therefore, <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> Hebron <S%H2275><s%> became <S%H1961><s%> the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> the Kenizzite <S%H7074><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> because <S%H3282><s%> <S%H834><s%> he followed <S%H310><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> fully. <S%H4390><s%>

Now the name <S%H8034><s%> of Hebron <S%H2275><s%> was formerly <S%H6440><s%> Kiriath-arba; [for Arba] was the greatest <S%H1419><s%> man <S%H120><s%> among the Anakim. <S%H6062><s%> Then the land <S%H776><s%> had <S%H8252><s%> rest <S%H8252><s%> from war. <S%H4421><s%>
